page.title: 15Entertainment
page.content: There are no theatres,opera houses or or cinemas in Hednesford.To enjoy such entertainments people in Hednesford have to travel to the surrounding towns.The Prince of Wales Hall in Cannock, the Grand in Wolverhampton and the Gatehouse in Stafford.There is a local cinema at Cannock and others at Walsall,Wolverhamton,Rugeley and Stafford.Few people visit the theatre or cinema regularly as it is expensive and quite difficult to get there.Visits are usually reserved for birthdays or Christmas. Most people hire a video film instead. Dances are held often at the social clubs,the Aquarius Ballroom and Anglesey Pub. Many clubs and pubs provide food, snooker, darts, music and bingo and are the main source of local entertainment. Going out for a meal with friends to the club or pub is a very popular activity.
